welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mariveles, Philippines! Get ready to be enchanted by our charming coastal town, known for its beautiful beaches, historical landmarks, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mariveles has to offer.

restaurants.name: Hap Chan Chinese Restaurant

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Subic Bay International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Subic Bay International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
